706485f-a.text:
233 ang 235 Riverdale Avenue, north side, between Rockaway Avenue and Thatford Street, showing two one-story homes, of a type not at all common in this neighborhood. On the right is the five-story
factory of the Rockaway Wire Works.
P.L.Sperr  October 23, 1931
